title: ver1.0
author: ver1.0
content: Wanting the old ZTEX 1.15y boards. Most will probably be in landfill, but hopefully someone has them in a box collecting dust somewhere.Any sale will have to go through escrow via bitcointalk trusted escrow user: minerjonesDon't bother trying to scam, wasting your time.Cheers.

comments.author: Papillion
comments.body: hey are those the same as the alchminer and silverfish chip era?thanks,

comments.author: ver1.0
comments.body: I don't know, but doubtful. They look like this:https://www.ztex.de/usb-fpga-1/usb-fpga-1.15y.e.htmlUSB-FPGA Module 1.15y Quad-Spartan 6 LX150 FPGA Board with USB 2.0 Microcontroller

comments.author: Papillion
comments.body: yeah, the 25M silverfish has spartan chips.look into the catgame rootfolder. not sure if its foil everywhere.best of luck(
